markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Signature Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2960) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Summoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=96)

**Prerequisites**
[Advanced Synergy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2956)

</column>

---

Your [eidolon](/classes/summoner/eidolons) gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies. You gain one evolution feat from the following list: [Airborne Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2933), [Burrowing Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2922), [Ever-Vigilant Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2937), or [Hulking Size](/Feats.aspx?ID=2919). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your summoner level is equal to your character level – 4.
name: Signature Synergy

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Signature Synergy Source Secrets of Magic pg. 77 1.1 Archetype Summoner Prerequisites Advanced Synergy --- Your eidolon gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies. You gain one evolution feat from the following list: Airborne Form, Burrowing Form, Ever-Vigilant Senses, or Hulking Size. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your summoner level is equal to your character level – 4.
